name: Badgers Eat Bugs
description:
Badgers Eat Bugs

The title of this game pretty much sums it up. This is not a deep or complex game, because those are not things that a badger can appreciate. Instead, it is a game full of bugs, which is exactly what a badger can appreciate.

Features
  • A badger
  • Several worms
  • Optional green bugs
  • Decorative bird
  • Seven puzzles
  • Some tunes
  • Peace and Simplicity
  • Mild Peril
Controls

(While the game is running, you can see the PICO-8 controls by clicking the controller icon on the right.)

Keyboard controls are:

  • Arrow keys: to move
  • Z key or C key: to sook worms
  • X key or V key: to retry or quit a puzzle
  • Enter key or P key: to open the pause menu

If you want to delete your save data for whatever strange reason, you can select RESET SAVE DATA from the pause menu to clear it.
